channel.title: pfsense on WIMART Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in pfsense on WIMART Thomas

item.title: Create a proxy server with Pfsense and Squid
item.description: In this note, we will see how to install a proxy server, using Pfsense and Squid. We will use virtual machines, created under Vmware Workstation 16 Pro. The different parts of this tutorial: Part-1 Part-2 Part-3 Part-4 Part-5 Topology of our network Here is the network topology that we will use in this tutorial: To access the Internet, “PC1” will go through the “Pfsense” router, in order to leave the local network “LAN”.
